mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO wifianalytics_counter.offline_old_user_sensor_day_counter ( tenant_id, project_id, place_id, sensor_id, date, metric_value ) VALUES
( #{item.tenant_id}, #{item.project_id}, #{item.place_id}, #{item.sensor_id}, #{item.date}, #{item.count} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE metric_value = VALUES(metric_value)
